DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness reduce triglyceride daily plasma exchange glucose+insulin infusion patient non-severe acute hypertriglyceridemic pancreatitis mildly elevate triglyceride
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Exchange v Conservative Management Non-severe Acute Hypertriglyceridemic Pancreatitis
DOC.criteria: mild acute hypertriglyceridemic pancreatitis triglyceride > 15 < 40 mmol/l pregnancy severe course pancreatitis
